name: Last of the Light
description:
Take the role of Spark, the last being of Light. Try to escape a world that is being overcome by Darkness while rescuing the remnants of your fallen friends.

Last of the Light is a simple platformer with gameplay utilizing momentum.

Most levels can be finished in less than a minute, allowing for play sessions as long or short as you have time for.

Gamepad is strongly recommended, but not required.

Minimum Specifications:

Windows 7 or higher

Intel i3 processor, 2.4GHz

~110mb RAM used by application
